incarnation.translation[0].definitions[0: the state of living in the form of a particular person or animal. According to some religions, people have several different incarnations.
She believes she was an Egyptian queen in a previous incarnation.
incarnation.translation[0].definitions[1: a period of time when someone or something has a particular job, use etc
The building has gone through several incarnations: as a station, a caf√©, and, most recently, a club.
incarnation.translation[0].definitions[2: the act of God coming to Earth in the human form of Christ, according to the Christian religion
incarnation.translation[1].definitions[0: (in Christianity) the coming of God to Earth in the body of Jesus Christ. The Christian belief is that there was a union of God and Man in Jesus Christ.
